h1_title: How to Unlock the Chapter 4 Secret Area
h2_title: How to Find the Venom Daoist for the Second Time
content: Once you've beaten him, he'll reference Purple Cloud Moutain and you'll see a wall appear nearby. Interact with this to enter Purple Cloud Mountain.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'How_to_Unlock_the_Chapter_4_Secret_Area.md', within the main section titled 'How to Unlock the Chapter 4 Secret Area', specifically from the subsection 'How to Find the Venom Daoist for the Second Time'.
The content is as follows:
Once you've beaten him, he'll reference Purple Cloud Moutain and you'll see a wall appear nearby. Interact with this to enter Purple Cloud Mountain.
